name: Carbonara
steps: Boil the pasta until al dente.
In a bowl, mix eggs, cheese, and pepper.
Fry the bacon and garlic in a pan.
Drain the pasta and add it to the pan with bacon.
Pour the egg mixture over the pasta and toss quickly.
Serve immediately.

name: Chicken
steps: Slice chicken and marinate it with soy sauce, garlic, and ginger.
Stir-fry chicken until cooked.
Add chopped bell peppers and broccoli.
Stir-fry until vegetables are tender.
Serve hot.

name: Caprese Salad
steps: Slice tomatoes and fresh mozzarella.
Arrange them in layers with basil leaves.
Drizzle balsamic glaze on top.
Serve cold.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a pan, sauté onion, carrots, celery, and garlic in olive oil.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Pour in the tomato sauce and simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve sauce over cooked spaghetti.

name: Garlic Butter Shrimp
steps: Peel and devein shrimp.
In a pan, melt butter and sauté minced garlic until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Squeeze lemon juice and garnish with chopped parsley.
Serve immediately.

name: Vegetable Fried Rice
steps: Cook rice according to package instructions and let it cool.
In a pan, scramble the egg and set it aside.
Stir-fry mixed vegetables in sesame oil.
Add cooked rice and soy sauce.
Mix in the scrambled egg.
Serve hot.

name: Classic Caesar Salad
steps: Wash and chop romaine lettuce.
Add croutons and shaved parmesan cheese.
Toss with Caesar dressing.
Serve cold.
